model.name: Scarf Print Reversible Bomber Jacket
model.disambiguatingDescription: A favorite Louis Vuitton reversible bomber jacket returns for the season in soft, lightweight silk twill printed with a classic allover Monogram signature on one side and this season’s statement archive bag scarf design on the other. Contrast ribbing underscores the sporty spirit of the silhouette, while a smart collar and the collection’s ornate buttons refine the look.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• Main Material : 100% Silk
  • Other Material : 79% Wool, 20% Polyamide, 1% Elastane
  • Lining : 53% Viscose, 47% Cupro
  • Grey
  • Regular fit
  • Model wears size 36
  • Model measurements : Bust 31'' / 79 cm, Height 5' 10" / 178 cm, Waist 23'' / 60 cm, Hips 34'' / 86 cm
  • Made in Italy
  • Do not wash
  • Do not bleach
  • Do not tumble dry
  • Iron at a maximum sole-plate temperature of 110°C
  • Mild professionnal dry cleaning in hydrocarbons
